long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way to digest and analyze web pages. Using OpenAI's technology that built ChatGPT, pagepal allows you to ask questions to further understand any page you read. Whether you want a quick summary, a clarification of a specific point, an author biography, or anything else you can dream up, pagepal enables you to get answers without even leaving the page.
